scripts.build:turbopack: cd examples/turbopack/example1 && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:webpack: cd examples/turbopack/example1 && npm i && npm run build-webpack
scripts.test:vite: npm run clean && npm run build:vite && node compare-bundles.js vite
scripts.test:turbopack: npm run clean && npm run build:turbopack && node compare-bundles.js turbopack
scripts.test:webpack: npm run clean && npm run build:webpack && node compare-bundles.js webpack
scripts.test:all: npm run test:vite && npm run test:turbopack && npm run test:webpack
